instructions: ## General Check the [official website](https://aborea.de/) to get the latest rulebooks and helpful tools. ## Handling * With the button "Fuer alle wuerfeln" or "Fuer GM wuerfeln" it is possible to switch the visible no for all dice that are rolled over the character sheet. * The button by profession allows you to deactivate the drop down menu and enter your own professions. * The automatic money calculation and the life calculation can be switched off and on with the corresponding buttons. * With the button at Inventory you can hide the description box. ## Contact If you find bugs or have suggestions, please use the [issue tracker](https://codeberg.org/tealk-roll20-character-sheets/Aborea/issues) for this sheet. ## Contribute If you want to support me, here is my [Roll20 wish list](https://marketplace.roll20.net/wishlists/207181) oder [Roll20-Abonnement](https://app.roll20.net/gift/forid/207181).

useroptions.description: Aktivieren falls ihr möchtet das eure Währung automatisch in das nächst Höhere umgewandelt werden soll.
Aktivieren falls ihr möchtet das euer Leben automatisch Berechnet wird. Achtung!! Der Beruf muss richtig geshrieben sein.
